question_text: Which of these is a reason to install an expansion NIC?
answer_options: To enable a computer without a built-in NIC to connect to a network
To speed up the CPU clock rate
To add more RAM to the computer
correct_answer: To enable a computer without a built-in NIC to connect to a network
explanation: Expansion NICs are used to add network connectivity to systems lacking built-in interfaces or to add additional ports.
